entries.journal_entry_description: Dr. Farnsworth has set up survey devices in the areas surrounding Kachirho. These devices are used to measure everything from rainfall to the number of passing fauna. Due to atmospheric conditions they have been unable to relay their data back to the doctor. He needs you to travel to the locations of each of the five survey devices and manually retrieve the data for him.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The first survey device is located on Bolotaur beach. This area lies to the west of the Rryatt gate. Use extreme caution in collecting this data since the Bolotaur are known to attack anything that moves.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The second survey device is located in the vicinity of the Rryatt Trail gate. This gate can be found to the northwest of the slaver camps.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The third survey device that you need to collect data from is near the Trandoshan slaver camps. These camps are located to the north of the Etyyy gate.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The fourth survey device was set up near the Etyyy gate.  This survey device is located to the southeast of Kachirho.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: The final survey device was set up near the Kkowir forest gate. The device is located to the west of Kachirho, across the bridge.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Gather up all of the survey data from the five different locations given to you by Dr. Farnsworth.
entries.task06_task_display_string_1: Collected data from the Kkowir forest gate.
entries.task06_task_display_string_2: Collected data from the Etyyy gate.
entries.task06_task_display_string_3: Collected data from the slaver camps.
entries.task06_task_display_string_4: Collected data from the Rryatt trail gate.
entries.task06_task_display_string_5: Collected data from the bolotaur beach.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Bring all of the collected data back to Dr. Farnsworth in Kachirho.
